ComicInfo.Summary:
G.I. Joe’s mission in Mongolia gets underway, but the Dreadnoks and Crystal Ball have more allies than the Joes expect. And meanwhile, Lady Jaye and Gung Ho stumble upon a familiar enemy in Greece…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Aaron Conley (a) & Jean-Francois Beaulieu (c) | 1 | Sub-A | Artist's Edition Subscription Cover A | Giannis Milonogiannis | 2 | Sub-B | Subscription Cover B | Nelson Daniel | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Corey Lewis | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-10 15:41:24. [CVDB578182]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Aaron Conley, Corey Lewis (Rey), Giannis Milonogiannis, Jean-Francois Beaulieu, Nelson Daniel
ComicInfo.Characters: Baroness, Burn-Out, Buzzer, Cover Girl, Crystal Ball, Dial Tone, Doc, Doc, Duke, Gnawgahyde, Grand Slam, Gung-Ho, Lady Jaye, Quick-Kick, Ripper, Road Pig, Roadblock, Rock & Roll, Scarlett, Skywarp, Zandar, Zanzibar, Zarana
ComicInfo.Teams: COBRA, Decepticons, Dreadnoks, G.I. Joe, Seekers
